content: sir batwington is an adorable little bat who thinks he is big and scary since his kind is known to be the spooky terror of halloween this creature of the night is pretty eager to live up to the hype however he uses his fearsome looks for good as he wishes to bravely chase evil spirits away from his fellow human this stuffed animal toy is a relatively quick and beginner-friendly crochet pattern for those who are familiar with the basic amigurumi stitches and doll making techniques such as sewing parts together and attaching eyes make sir batwington today as a great gift for yourself or any bat lovers out there ~~~ **finished measurement ** 5 inches 13 cm tall **level ** ★★☆☆☆ easy / familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below and sewing pieces together **stitches/terms us terms ** magic_ring magic_ring chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease decrease half_double_crochet half_double_crochet fhdc foundation half_double_crochet video tutorial available 1 **materials ** medium weight 4 yarn in light grey and dark grey 2 75mm hook fiberfill stuffing pair of 10mm plastic safety eyes yarn needle scissors ~~~ this pattern is © 2019 sweet softies www sweetsofties com for personal use only you may not copy alter or sell this pattern in any way you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer and link to my website no wholesale * www sweetsofties com www instagram com/sweetsofties @sweetsofties www etsy com/shop/sylemn www facebook com/sweetsofties www youtube com/sweetsofties www pinterest com/sweetsofties 1 https //youtu be/abpvmufusua
